head.title: Sept. 10-16; The End of a Knight Era

hedline.hl1: Sept. 10-16; The End of a Knight Era

block.p: After 29 years and three national titles, Bob Knight, the iconic and notorious college basketball coach, was fired by Indiana University after several charges of ''uncivil, defiant and unacceptable behavior.'' The university's students did not let him go quietly: thousands marched to the president's house in protest, which brought out police officers in riot gear.
